DOC.brief_summary: The investigators will examine the possible synergistic effects of obstructive sleep apnea (OSA) and type II diabetes mellitus (DM) on vascular functioning by performing a two-part investigation: - A cross-sectional study comparing subjects with OSA+DM, OSA only, DM only, and healthy controls. - A three-month randomized placebo-controlled trial of continuous positive airway pressure (CPAP) in subjects with OSA+DM.
DOC.brief_title: Vascular Impairment in Type II Diabetes Mellitus With Co-morbid Obstructive Sleep Apnea
DOC.criteria: OSA subjects: apneahypopnea index >=10 and <100 DM subjects: clinical diagnosis of DM and glycated hemoglobin < 8.0% Hematocrit < 32 Pregnancy Infectious/collagen vascular/hepatic or renal/cardiopulmonary disease
